document_data.mainbody:
'''''Champions of Ruin''''' is an accessory for the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'' campaign setting using the 3.5{{th}}-edition {{dnd}} ruleset.
{{Quote|'''''Explore the Darker Side of the Realms'''''

''Every corner of [[Faerûn]] harbors its own sinister element. When opportunities arise, malevolent groups and nefarious individuals emerge from the shadows to make their infamous marks on the [[Forgotten Realms|Realms]]. Within these pages, you will discover everything players and Dungeon Masters need to create the most evil organizations, treacherous villains, and morally ambiguous antiheroes to ever afflict the Forgotten Realms game setting.''

* ''3 new races''
* ''Over 30 new spells''
* ''New feats and prestige classes''}}

document_data.Description: ''Champions of Ruin'' provides details on the role of evil in the Realms. It has information of various villains, evil-oriented organizations and introduces three new evil-aligned races. It also contains new spells, feats and prestige classes.
